114.job_description: Our Journey  ShopBack was born one night in 2014 when co-founders Henry and Joel were toying around (with entrepreneurial ideas) in Henry's car, sparking the concept of earning Cashback while shopping online. The ShopBack Group has now grown to become the leading shopping, rewards, and payments platform in Asia-Pacific, with 45 million shoppers across 12 markets and more than half a million transactions powered for 20,000 partners daily. Fresh off its debut in the European market, ShopBack is seeking thrill-seekers to join the journey of building The World's Most Rewarding Way to Shop. Get ready for the ride of a lifetime: a blend of startup spirit woven into a solid business foundation.We are looking for a motivated and detail-oriented Consumer Operation System Intern to join our Consumer Operations Application team. In this role, you will assist with the management and optimization of consumer operation systems. This opportunity is perfect for individuals who are excited to gain practical experiences in system management, automation technologies, and AI-driven solutions.Your Adventure AheadConsumer System Support: Assist in the day-to-day operation system management, including user administrations and system maintenance.  AI Chatbot Support: Assist in the setup, testing, and optimizing of the AI chatbot used in customer service operations. Monitor chatbot interactions to ensure accuracy and efficiency, providing suggestions for improvements. Collaborate with the team to update and maintain the chatbot’s knowledge base and response scripts. Analyze chatbot performance metrics and prepare reports for ongoing optimization.  Reporting and Documentation: Analyze data and create insightful reports to aid decision-making and drive continuous improvement efforts. Documenting the supporting pages for operational initiatives, projects, or product launches.  Essentials to SucceedSystems support enthusiast: You have a keen interest in exploring and managing customer service operations through systems, coupled with a strong desire to learn and engage with the latest technologies.  Analytical thinker: You possess good analytical and problem-solving skills.  Effective communicator: You have good English communication skills, enabling you to effectively engage and collaborate with cross-border stakeholders.  Proactive: You thrive in a fast-paced environment. You're the kind of person who takes the initiative and tackles challenges head-on. ShopBackers' DNA Grit - We tackle all challenges head-on, working together to solve problems and achieve success.  Hunger - We value hard work, and having relentless drive.  Speed - We move fast and have a bias for action, all to deliver maximum impact.  Impact - We focus on results, always aiming for the best possible outcomes and timelines.  Growth - We embrace a growth mindset, constantly striving to learn, improve, and excel in our roles.Exclusively for ShopBackers Career progression paths and opportunities to take on greater challenges that help you realise your ambitions.  Be part of a winning team on a journey to global scale.  Competitive compensation based on your performance.  Work-From-Anywhere benefit to enable you to thrive personally and professionally.  Candid, open, and collaborative culture where feedback is valued, for everyone to grow and improve every day.

115.job_description: Job Description  GPO (Global Planning Operations) is a VF group, supporting Assembly/Test Planning in the end-to-end processes. The Planning analyst is an individual contributor position, with the following responsibilities:  Own supply analysis required to support Assy Test response and execution, executes the assigned task independently within the specified timeline without any data quality occurrence. Maintain A/T schedule and drive on-time factory responses as well as ensure system synchronicity all the time. Able to coordinate issue resolutions and connect with stakeholders for the options feasibility and implementation. Identify and drive systems and business process improvements to continuously increase efficiency and achieve productivity target. Able to interpret data by analyzing the trends and patterns using statistical analysis, draws conclusions, and makes preliminary recommendations on the process improvements Identify data automation opportunities and implement/maintain automation scripts with given tools/solutions. Remote/ hybrid working modelQualifications  The ideal candidate must possess the below minimum qualifications requirements to be initially considered for this position:  Bachelor’s or master’s degree in industrial engineering, Business Administration, Science or similar. At least 1 year of work experience in a technology company. Fluent Written and Verbal English level. Advanced Excel and Data Analytics Skills.Preferred Qualifications: In this role you will require also:  Proven knowledge and hands-on experience with one of programming languages e.g. SQL, Python, Json, C#, Javascript, HTML Have general Supply Chain knowledge. Analytical and Problem-solving skills (LEAN methodology - advantage) Statistics knowledge in Demand forecast.The ideal candidate must exhibit the following behavioral traits:  Attention to details Stakeholder Management Communication, Negotiation, and Influencing Skills Flexible and adaptive to change, customer orientationInside this Business Group As the world's largest chip manufacturer, Intel strives to make every facet of semiconductor manufacturing state-of-the-art - from semiconductor process development and manufacturing, through yield improvement to packaging, final test and optimization, and world class Supply Chain and facilities support. Employees in the Technology Development and Manufacturing Group are part of a worldwide network of design, development, manufacturing, and assembly/test facilities, all focused on utilizing the power of Moore’s Law to bring smart, connected devices to every person on Earth.  Other Locations MY, 02, Kulim; MY, 07, Penang; VN, SG, Ho Chi Minh City  Posting Statement All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, religious creed, sex, national origin, ancestry, age, physical or mental disability, medical condition, genetic information, military and veteran status, marital status, pregnancy, gender, gender expression, gender identity, sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by local law, regulation, or ordinance.  Benefits We offer a total compensation package that ranks among the best in the industry. It consists of competitive pay, stock, bonuses, as well as, benefit programs which include health, retirement, and vacation. Find more information about all of our Amazing Benefits here.  Your privacy matters to Intel and we comply with applicable data protection laws. We collect and maintain personal information for recruitment related activities and your data will not be used for any other purpose. We retain personal information for the periods and purposes set forth in Intel Privacy Notice. Retention periods can vary significantly based on the type of information and how it is used. We do not share your personal information with third parties. In order for Intel to communicate with you on your application results, by submitting your information and proceeding with this application, you agree and consent that we can collect your personal information. You will have the ability to opt-out by informing vietnamjobs@intel.com or at any time selecting unsubscribe found at the bottom of our future marketing communications. You have rights to correct, update, request access to or deletion of your personal information as described in Intel Privacy Notice. In addition, if you wish to update or otherwise make changes to your resume, use Intel online application tool to resubmit a new resume.  Working Model This role will be eligible for our hybrid work model which allows employees to split their time between working on-site at their assigned Intel site and off-site. In certain circumstances the work model may change to accommodate business needs.  JobType Hybrid

116.job_description: DescriptionLocation  Why Confluence?  Over the past several years we have undergone a great deal of positive change and growth to become the company we are today. Our global footprint now spans multiple countries, giving our employees the opportunity to get exposure to other countries and cultures. And it stands to reason that none of this would have been possible without the hundreds of hard-working employees who work at Confluence. More about the role & teamSeeking highly motivated individuals who can self-manage but also excel working within global professional service teams. Individuals need to be able to use critical problem-solving skills to define, execute, and drive solutions to completion. Individuals need to be able to adapt in a fast-paced environment whilst completing project deliverables across multiple client projects, on time and within budget. In addition, individuals that have a familiarity with computer science or fintech market knowledge are preferred.  What skills and experience do I need to succeed? You will need bachelor’s degree with a focus on Computer science, business systems or IT related degree preferred.  0-2 years of experience within FinTech, Software and IT related businesses. Working Hours: 3pm – 11pm local time. If you are looking for a new challenge every day, this is the role for you. You may have worked as a ‘Implementation Consultant’, or 'Implementation Specialist’.  What do we offer?Confluence offers generous benefit packages for team members. As a growing, global organization, we are always looking for ways to ensure that our employees can access benefits that matter to them and their families. This includes:  Generous Time Off packages including additional half days with each public holiday in your location.Global Career Development opportunitiesSocial Events  Referral Bonus scheme - Upto $3,000 per successful referralPlus many more! Integrity  Face reality with honesty, courage and accountability  Imagination  Deal creatively with challenges and envision what the world could be  Discipline  Build good habits into reflexes which become a part of our life  Service  Committed to the success of othersIf you would like to find out more about a Career at Confluence, please apply today.About Confluence Technologies  As a leading global technology solutions provider to the investment management industry, Confluence helps clients solve complex investment data challenges across the front, middle and back office. Headquartered in Pittsburgh, PA, Confluence services over 1000 clients in 40 countries, with locations across Europe, North America, South Africa, Australia and Asia.

120.job_description: Hồ Chí Minh  Full-timeWe are looking for a high-functioning Product Owner with a can-do spirit to develop a health-tech product from ideation to sunset. As the Product Owner for Health-Tech, you will have the opportunity to drive the development and execution of this product and play a key role in optimizing conversion rates for healthcare products with a superb filter based on machine learning/artificial intelligence. This is an exciting opportunity to join a fast-growing and dynamic team and make a meaningful impact on prediction-driven customer acquisition solutions through Zalo portal. What you will doLead the product development process, from ideation to launch, and beyond; Define product strategy and vision, and communicate this to all stakeholders; Conduct market research and analysis to identify new opportunities and ensure that our product remains competitive; Collaborate with cross-functional squads, including engineering, design, marketing, and customer support, to ensure that the product is delivered on time, on budget, and to the highest quality standards; Build and maintain strong relationships with key stakeholders, including customers, partners, and internal teams; Prioritize product features and development initiatives based on customer feedback, market research, and business goals; Monitor product performance and make data-driven decisions to continuously improve the user experience.  What you will needBachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Business or other related fields with excellent academic performance; Analytical mindset to break down complex problems, with a strong will to get things done and deliver results; Excellent verbal and written communication skills are a must, as is the ability to work effectively with multiple internal teams and external organizations; Detail-oriented with excellent organizational and time management skills; At least 2 years of experience in product management, with a proven track record of launching successful products; Effective project management skills to drive product development and launches is preferred; Experience working in a fast-paced start-up environment, with the ability to thrive under pressure.

124.job_description: Medical Representative - ONCO - HCMAbout AstraZeneca and AstraZeneca VietnamAstraZeneca AstraZeneca (LSE/STO/Nasdaq: AZN) is a global, science-led biopharmaceutical company that focuses on the discovery, development, and commercialization of prescription medicines in Oncology, Rare Diseases and BioPharmaceuticals, including Cardiovascular, Renal & Metabolism, and Respiratory & Immunology. Based in Cambridge, UK, AstraZeneca operates in over 100 countries and its innovative medicines are used by millions of patients worldwide. Please visit astrazeneca.com and follow the Company on Twitter @AstraZeneca.AstraZeneca Vietnam As a Foreign Invested Enterprise with over 600 members, AstraZeneca is investing into Vietnam 360 million USD from 2020 to 2030 with a focus on reducing the burdens of non-communicable diseases, developing local talent, and uplifting the domestic biopharmaceutical R&D and manufacturing capabilities.  Over the last three decades accompanying Vietnam’s sustainable development, AstraZeneca has run several impactful programmes in collaboration with the Government, Ministry of Health and healthcare partners to promote disease awareness, prevention and early detection. In recent years, AstraZeneca Vietnam has received several certificates of merit from the Prime Minister and Minister of Health, for excellent contributions to Vietnam’s vaccine diplomacy, fight against COVID-19 and advancement of cancer treatment and disease awareness. The company has also been recognized among Vietnam’s Top 100 Best Places to Work (2018 – 2023) with various other industry awards from BritCham, EuroCham, and government agencies.What you’ll do  Successfully complete all training requirements, including product examinations. Engage specialty healthcare professionals in dialogue about approved indications and product efficacy/safety profiles to support on-label prescribing for appropriate patients. Work with Sales Manager to develop a local strategy and business plan to meet or exceed sales and call execution goals in territory Drive sales performance and ensure sales forecasts and assigned budgets meet or exceed therapeutic and territory expectations. Develop and maintain in-depth knowledge of market, demographic, and managed markets information relative to assigned sales territory. Excellent problem-solving abilities with keen attention to detail.Experience in providing technical training and customer service. Strong communication skills, capable of translating technical concepts for non-technical staff and customers.  Preferred Qualifications  Experience in the F&B service or hospitality industry is a plus.Knowledge of e-commerce platforms and digital payment systems.Relevant certifications (e.g., AWS, Azure, ITIL) are a plus.Understanding of UX/UI principles as they relate to technical performance and user experience Lương:  Thương lượng  Địa chỉ:  Pizza 4P‘s Ho Chi Minh Phòng ban:  Head Office (Non-managerial Level)  Hạn nộp hồ sơ:  22/08 — 21/09/2024

126.job_description: Chi Doanh - CB/I Digital is seeking for an experienced Content Creator who will be responsible for producing high-quality content in both English and Vietnamese and utilizing their exceptional writing skills and creativity. JOB DESCRIPTIONCreate SEO-optimized content in English and Vietnamese across various formats, including:Blog posts, Articles, Product descriptions, Landing pages, Category pages Conduct keyword research Create content at scale, managing a high volume of assignments Optimize content structure, headings, meta descriptions, and tags that meet SEO standards Monitor and analyze content performance using tools like Google Analytics and Search Console to identify improvement opportunities Stay up-to-date with the latest SEO trends, algorithms, and best practices to ensure content remains competitive Collaborate with the SEO and marketing teams to develop and implement content strategies aligned with project goals.BENEFITSA competitive salary depending on your level of expertise A dynamic, transparent, and professional work environment Social insurance, health insurance and other benefits in accordance with the Labor Law and the Company policies PLUS PTI premium insurance An annual company trip A possibility for an early salary raise with solid contribution A 13th month salary and a bonus based on the performance Overtime pay according to company policy (x1.5 for weekdays, x2 for weekends) Flexible work hours. Collaborative work environment with a focus on continuous improvement and innovation Access to industry-leading SEO tools and resources Opportunities for professional development by joining big enterprise project in both Vietnam and US Mentorship from experienced content creators and SEO experts Exposure to a wide range of industries and topics to enhance your writing versatility.REQUIREMENTRequired Qualifications  Native-level proficiency in Vietnamese and professional working proficiency in English Experience with keyword research and content optimization techniques Familiarity with any SEO tools (such as Google Analytics, Search Console, or Ahrefs) Good at writing, editing, and proofreading skills Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to present complex information clearly and persuasively. Preferred Qualifications  Proven experience in creating SEO-focused content that drives organic traffic. Experience using AI tools like ChatGPT, Gemini, or Claude to streamline content creation and optimization processes is a big plus Familiarity with WordPress or other content management systems Understanding of internal link building and SEO tactics Good at time management and organizational skills Knowledge of HTML and basic web publishing. Những câu hỏi thường gặp Kỹ năng và chuyên môn cần có ở một chuyên gia SEO Content?Để trở thành một chuyên gia SEO Content, bạn cần phát triển một loạt kỹ năng và kiến thức chuyên môn quan trọng:  1. Hiểu biết về seo:  Nắm vững các nguyên tắc cơ bản của seo, bao gồm tối ưu hóa trang web (on-page seo), xây dựng liên kết (off-page seo), và tối ưu hóa kỹ thuật. 2. Nghiên cứu từ khóa:  Học cách sử dụng công cụ nghiên cứu từ khóa để tìm ra những từ khóa phù hợp với mục tiêu của doanh nghiệp và khách hàng mục tiêu. 3. Viết lách chất lượng:  Phát triển kỹ năng viết lách để tạo ra nội dung hấp dẫn, thông tin và tối ưu cho seo. 4. Phân tích đối thủ:  Nghiên cứu và phân tích chiến lược nội dung của đối thủ cạnh tranh để hiểu được những gì họ đang làm và làm thế nào bạn có thể làm tốt hơn. 5. Hiểu biết về content marketing:  Nắm vững cách thức tiếp thị nội dung và cách nó tích hợp với các chiến lược seo tổng thể. 6. Sử dụng công cụ seo:  Trở nên thành thạo với các công cụ seo như google analytics, semrush, ahrefs, hoặc moz để theo dõi hiệu suất và cải thiện chiến lược nội dung của bạn. 7. Cập nhật xu hướng mới:  Luôn cập nhật với các xu hướng mới trong seo và marketing nội dung để nội dung của bạn không lỗi thời. 8. Thực hành liên tục:  Seo là một lĩnh vực thay đổi nhanh chóng, vì vậy việc thực hành liên tục và thử nghiệm mới là cách tốt nhất để học hỏi và cải thiện.

128.job_description: Diagnostics Science Liaison Specialist - HCMAbout AstraZeneca and AstraZeneca VietnamAstraZeneca AstraZeneca (LSE/STO/Nasdaq: AZN) is a global, science-led biopharmaceutical company that focuses on the discovery, development, and commercialization of prescription medicines in Oncology, Rare Diseases and BioPharmaceuticals, including Cardiovascular, Renal & Metabolism, and Respiratory & Immunology. Based in Cambridge, UK, AstraZeneca operates in over 100 countries and its innovative medicines are used by millions of patients worldwide. Please visit astrazeneca.com and follow the Company on Twitter @AstraZeneca.AstraZeneca Vietnam As a Foreign Invested Enterprise with over 600 members, AstraZeneca is investing into Vietnam 360 million USD from 2020 to 2030 with a focus on reducing the burdens of non-communicable diseases, developing local talent, and uplifting the domestic biopharmaceutical R&D and manufacturing capabilities.  Over the last three decades accompanying Vietnam’s sustainable development, AstraZeneca has run several impactful programmes in collaboration with the Government, Ministry of Health and healthcare partners to promote disease awareness, prevention and early detection. In recent years, AstraZeneca Vietnam has received several certificates of merit from the Prime Minister and Minister of Health, for excellent contributions to Vietnam’s vaccine diplomacy, fight against COVID-19 and advancement of cancer treatment and disease awareness. The company has also been recognized among Vietnam’s Top 100 Best Places to Work (2018 – 2023) with various other industry awards from BritCham, EuroCham, and government agencies.What you’ll doJob Description / Capsule The Diagnostic Specialist ensures the timely, high quality in-market companion diagnostics / testing solutions to enable optimal treatment throughout the patient journey. An important element of the role is therefore to develop strategic and long-term partnerships with relevant Oncology stakeholders and decision makers in the complex Oncology ecosystem, based on a deep scientific understanding of diagnostic tests and the clinical operational issues on the testing pathway, enabling tailored testing solutions to be developed.Objective  Critical actions  Develop diagnostic strategy  Develop, evaluate and deliver the national diagnostic strategy for the current and future Oncology products, play a role in shaping national policy Generate diagnostics-related insight to shape national brand strategy and tactics Monitor and propose improvement plans for diagnostic related brand performance Ensure in-market companion diagnostics / testing excellence for all product launches, including market readiness evaluation to inform go/no go decisionsSupport testing by improving the testing environment  Support in-market registration / regulatory approval of future companion diagnostics / other testing solutions as required Identify issues in current testing landscape and working with external stakeholders to develop solutions to remove or minimize diagnostic barriers to therapy use, e.g., by optimizing testing pathways Work with P&MA to identify innovative access / reimbursement solutions for companion diagnostics Develop and help drive diagnostic quality assurance (QA) programmes Utilise diagnostics related evidence for medical education activity (e.g., medical evidence, real-world evidence and epidemiology) and identify evidence gaps for either global or local plans to bridgeDevelop strategic partnerships  Assess different testing options in the markets and select and qualify diagnostic partners and testing labs Identify and collaborate with national diagnostic and clinical opinion leaders to identify, design and execute activities to optimise the provision of diagnostics associated with the respective brands Remove barriers to testing through collaborative partnerships with diagnostic companies, lab networks, KOLs and HCPs Help develop testing pathway robustness in all key national clinical centres, including local protocol support, working on identifying and removing bottlenecks in testing pathways, e.g., in counselling  Present credibly to a wider audience in order to act as company spokesperson on diagnostic scientific matters at congresses, symposia and scientific meetings  Build capability in internal and external stakeholders  Act as subject matter expert for external stakeholdersDeliver diagnostic related educational initiatives including meetings, exhibitions, congresses/symposia, digital activities Give relevant stakeholders in the Multi-Disciplinary Team (MDT) and Decision Making Unit (DMU) and testing labs a stronger understanding of the diagnostic landscape, challenges and potential testing solutionsAct as an educational resource to internal colleaguesDevelop diagnostic expertise in cross-functional team i.e. medical, sales, payer evidence Engage with, lead and partner with all members of the cross-functional team on all diagnostic related activities to ensure AZ's Oncology products' launch readiness and optimal launch of therapy  Provision of key inputs to P&MA strategy build and implementation including pricing and reimbursement cases for therapy and associated diagnostic tests  Compliance with relevant company and industry code of Conduct and also to comply with local country codes  Keep regular update and operate within the relevant Codes of Conduct, Ethical Interactions (EI), including GPEI and SOPs Be sure to understand AZ policies when engage to KOLs and external stakeholders Education, Qualifications, Skills and Experience  Essential  University degree in life sciences, science and technology, molecular biology. Experience of broad range of oncology diagnostic, pathology, and therapeutic marketing Proven experience with a broad base of external stakeholders including prescribers, payers, providers and track record of effective management of decision-making bodies and governance Desirable  Advanced scientific degree Understanding of multiple aspects of Testing environment Project management experience Key Relationships to reach solutions  Internal (to AZ or team)  Commercial (Sales, Strategic Account Management, Marketing, Procurement, etc.) Global Diagnostic leadership Cross-functional team, incl. 132.job_description: KMS Technology was established in 2009 as a U.S.-based software services company. With development centers in Vietnam and Mexico, we have been trusted globally for the superlative quality of our software consulting & development services, technology solutions, and engineers' expertise. Flexible working time Various training on hot-trend technologies, best practices, and soft skills Premium healthcare insurance for you and your loved ones Company trip, big annual year-end party every year, team building,... 138.job_description: We help the world run better  At SAP, we enable you to bring out your best. Our company culture is focused on collaboration and a shared passion to help the world run better. How? We focus every day on building the foundation for tomorrow and creating a workplace that embraces differences, values flexibility, and is aligned to our purpose-driven and future-focused work. We offer a highly collaborative, caring team environment with a strong focus on learning and development, recognition for your individual contributions, and a variety of benefit options for you to choose from.  About SAP Labs Network and SAP Labs Vietnam SAP Labs Network is the global R&D setup where over 55,000 engineers around the world create, operate and support the most innovative enterprise solutions for SAP’s customers worldwide. SAP Labs Vietnam aims to become one of the key locations within the SAP Labs Network to support the engineering growth for SAP.Meet your team The Intelligent Spend and Business Network (ISBN) Product Success team has the mission to drive customer obsession across the entire ISBN product experience. Our vision is to drive a customer centric journey (process, tools, culture), leveraging automation and data driven approaches, across the ISBN portfolio to improve the product experience for our customers with the goal of improved customer satisfaction and value, consumption of our products, and improved operational efficiency. We collaborate closely with product management and engineering across the ISBN product portfolio in addition to customers and partners to deliver faster time to value at a lower total cost of ownership. We establish new processes, strategies and tools, to shorten time-to-value, increase adoption and improve the product experience. SAP ISBN Product Success represents a strategic team and fast-growing area, with a strong customer focus and results-driven working mode. Covering multiple locations around the world, we bring together a diverse team of talents.  What you'll do We are looking for a passionate and experienced Frontend Developer to join a new engineering team.  Responsible for development focusing on design, coding, testing, automation, quality assurance of specific (complex) product features in a development team. Analyze and solve (complex) issues in existing and new code.  • Apply Agile Software Engineering principles and DevOps model for continuous delivery. • Work with all development process contributors, e.g., Product Owners, Product Managers, Architects, Project Management, Scrum Masters, Developers, User Assistance Developer and DevOps to establish and execute a flawless development process.  Deliver first class results, by handling your tasks with enthusiasm and personal commitment. Build future-proof products using state of the art technologies. What you bring  Education  o University degree in science or engineering  Development o Expertise in developing cloud & SaaS applications.  o Expertise in java script, TypeScript, React. Angular, SAP UI5, Fiori. o Exposure to microservice architecture, multi target application o Building applications on CF, SCP/BTP o Experience with SAP Products is beneficial: SAP Ariba, SAP Fieldglass, and/or SAP Concur, SAP Business Technology Platform o Experience on cloud (AWS, GCP or Azure).Process  o Experience in agile development practices (SCRUM) test-driven development as well as domain-driven development is required.  DevOps o Know How of CI/CD tools integration/ operations/ change management, and maintenance.WORK EXPERIENCE  3+ years of experience in building software products / service with a preference for experience with SaaS Applikation Expertise in front end development  • Background with ERP and / or ISBN solutions • Knowhow of AI/ML  Worked in the global teams with high levels of collaboration. Experience in cloud applications development will be an advantage. Good writing & presentation skills Strong customer focus #SAPLabsVietnamCareers  Bring out your best SAP innovations help more than four hundred thousand customers worldwide work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. Originally known for leadership in enterprise resource planning (ERP) software, SAP has evolved to become a market leader in end-to-end business application software and related services for database, analytics, intelligent technologies, and experience management. As a cloud company with two hundred million users and more than one hundred thousand employees worldwide, we are purpose-driven and future-focused, with a highly collaborative team ethic and commitment to personal development. Whether connecting global industries, people, or platforms, we help ensure every challenge gets the solution it deserves. At SAP, you can bring out your best.  We win with inclusion SAP’s culture of inclusion, focus on health and well-being, and flexible working models help ensure that everyone – regardless of background – feels included and can run at their best. At SAP, we believe we are made stronger by the unique capabilities and qualities that each person brings to our company, and we invest in our employees to inspire confidence and help everyone realize their full potential. We ultimately believe in unleashing all talent and creating a better and more equitable world. SAP is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to the values of Equal Employment Opportunity and provide accessibility accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are interested in applying for employment with SAP and are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team: Careers@sap.com For SAP employees: Only permanent roles are eligible for the SAP Employee Referral Program, according to the eligibility rules set in the SAP Referral Policy. Specific conditions may apply for roles in Vocational Training.  EOE AA M/F/Vet/Disability: Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their age, race, religion, national origin, ethnicity, age, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, et al), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, protected veteran status, or disability. CÁC KINH NGHIỆM LIÊN QUAN  Số năm kinh nghiệm liên quan: 1-2 năm Các kinh nghiệm làm việc có liên quan đến công việc hiện tại: có kinh nghiệm hành chính tổng hợp, hành chính lễ tân, tổ chức các hoạt động gắn kết nhân viên nội bộ. 145.job_description: Who are we? Mantu is an independent international consulting player, founded in 2007. Bringing together expert and complementary brands, Mantu stands out for the breadth of its spectrum, responding to all business transformation challenges.  Its activities are divided into four practices: Leadership & Advocacy, Technology, Digital Marketing & Experience, Total Talent Management.  A wide range of skills, all serving a single mission: connecting and powering companies with leading teams and technology to succeed faster and sustainably.  From its headquarters in Geneva, Switzerland, Mantu relies on a community of 11,500 talented people in more than 60 countries on 5 continents and has a turnover of 1billion euros.  Job description 1. Job Summary:We are seeking a skilled and motivated HR Data Analyst to join our Human Resources team. The ideal candidate will have a solid background in data analysis and a strong passion for using data to inform HR strategies and decisions. In this role, you will be instrumental in supporting HR functions by creating dynamic dashboards and analytics to uncover data-driven insights, optimize HR processes, and contribute to overall organizational effectiveness. 2. Key Responsibilities: Data Analysis: Collect, analyze, and interpret HR data to provide actionable insights for the HR team and stakeholders, ensuring accuracy and relevance.Dashboard and Report Development: Create and maintain HR dashboards and reports in PowerBI using data directly queried from the company’s data warehouse.Ad-Hoc Analysis: Support HR with data analysis as needed to meet immediate demands.Cross-Departmental Collaboration: Work with Finance, Recruitment, Marketing, and other departments on cross-departmental analysis.HR Projects: Participate in HR projects to improve data consistency and optimize processes.Technology Implementation: Assist in rolling out new HR technologies and data systems. 3. Qualifications: Education: Bachelor’s degree in Economics, Computer Science, Human Resources, or a related field.Experience: 2 to 4 years in data analysis; HR experience is a plus but not required.Communication Skills: Strong verbal and written skills in both Vietnamese and English, with the ability to communicate with technical and non-technical stakeholders.HR Knowledge: Basic understanding of HR KPIs and metrics is a must; advanced knowledge is a plus.Technical Skills:Proficient in PowerBI is a must, with experience creating and managing dashboards.Strong skills in SQL and Excel is also a must.Familiarity with Power Automate, Power Apps, advanced statistical analysis, or Python is a plus.Teamwork: Able to work well in a young and dynamic team.Continuous Learning: Eager to learn and stay current with industry trends.  Mantu is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to promoting diversity within the workforce and creating an inclusive working environment. For this purpose, we welcome applications from all qualified candidates regardless of gender, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, beliefs, age, marital status, disability or other characteristics.

146.job_description: Giới thiệu: We are a product startup in Silicon Valley looking for exceptional full-stack developers in Vietnam, who will own/build/deploy our AI-based product. You will be working and mentored by successful startup founders, who have built and sold companies in Silicon Valley and have experience working in top technology companies such as Amazon and Facebook. You will own the critical product features that have direct customer impacts. This position is NOT for someone who is looking for a steady and well-defined job but for someone who has an entrepreneurial mentality, who can embrace changes, fast execution speed, and are eager to learn/explore advanced technologies.  Job requirements More than 5 years of experience in the industry. Strong experience in building AI products serving real customers (e.g. data processing, finetuning models, building chatbot). Very good at English (verbal and written) Experience with AI Stack: Python/LLM (OpenAI, Claude)/Lang Chain/Jupyter Notebook. Preferences You are young and hungry. You love building kick-ass products so much that sometimes you forget that you are living on earth. You are willing to work really really hard regardless of time and get great reward for doing so. You have built and deployed 1 or 2 serious AI products. You have an entrepreneurial mentality. Always want to learn new things and explore new technology frontiers. Your friends found you boring because you are always talking about coding. You admit your mistakes and learn fast to not repeat the same ones. Benefits Stock options Work computer and equipments On-site business trips to company HQ in the US Health Insurance Unlimited time off Địa điểm làm việc: TPHCM Lương: 30000K - 40000K VND một tháng Loại hình công việc: Thỏa thuận thời gian  Yêu cầu: Quyền lợi: Bảo Hiểm Y Tế, Chăm Sóc Sức Khỏe, Cơ Hội Thăng Tiến Hạn nộp: 2024-09-18 Kinh nghiệm: 5 - 6 năm Bằng cấp: Đại học Lĩnh vực: IT/CNTT -IT Phần mềm Số lượng cần tuyển: 1 Giới tính: Không yêu cầu

147.job_description: THOTH AI., Other, Ho Chi MinhTầng 5, Panorama Nha Trang, số 2 Nguyễn Thị Minh Khai, Phường Lộc Thọ, Thành phố Nha Trang  At office Posted 3 days agoSkills: QA QC Games Tester Job descriptionAbout Us: We are an international gaming company, looking for a Junior QA Tester with 1-2 years of experience to join our QA team, ensure the quality of our products. Job Summary: As a Junior QA Tester, you will be responsible for testing our games to identify bugs, glitches, and issues that could impact the player experience. You will work closely with the development team to ensure that our games meet the highest standards of quality before they are released to the public. Key Responsibilities:Testing and Bug Reporting: Execute test cases, identify bugs, and document issues in a clear and concise manner. Report and track bugs using bug-tracking tools like JIRA, Bugzilla, or similar. Functional Testing: Perform functional, regression, and smoke testing on various game builds to ensure the game operates as intended. Collaboration: Work closely with developers, designers, and other team members to understand game mechanics and design, providing feedback on potential issues. Test Case Creation: Assist in the creation and maintenance of test cases and test plans to cover all aspects of the game. Documentation: Maintain accurate and detailed documentation of test procedures, findings, and test results. User Experience Testing: Assess the game from the end-user's perspective, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable gaming experience. Compliance Testing: Ensure the game complies with platform requirements (e.g., console, mobile) and adheres to industry standards. Feedback: Provide constructive feedback on gameplay, UI/UX, and overall player experience.  Your skills and experience  Qualifications: at least 01 year experience in QA testing, preferably in the gaming industry. Knowledge of Game Development: Basic understanding of game development processes and software development life cycles (SDLC). Tools Proficiency: Experience with bug-tracking tools (e.g., JIRA, Bugzilla), version control systems (e.g., Git), and test management tools. Attention to Detail: Keen eye for detail, with a strong focus on identifying issues that may impact the player experience. Analytical Skills: Ability to analyse and reproduce complex bugs and issues. Communication Skills: Strong written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to clearly convey issues and suggestions. Team Player: Ability to work effectively in a team environment, with a positive attitude and willingness to learn. Passion for Gaming: Genuine interest in gaming and a desire to contribute to the creation of top-tier gaming experiences. Preferred Qualifications: Experience with automated testing tools and scripting languages. Knowledge of various gaming platforms (e.g., PC, consoles, mobile). Familiarity with agile methodologies.  Why you'll love working here. THOTH AI  THOTH AICompany type IT ProductCompany industry  Game Company size 51-150 employeesCountryVietnam  Working days Monday - FridayOvertime policy Extra days off for OT

149.job_description: Job Brief As a QC engineer, your responsibilities cover for writing and executing manual test cases as well as specialized testing covering the one or more areas of: UI, API, security, system performance, database testing, network/protocol analysis, and installation/configuration. Responsibilities  Ensure the assigned tasks to be performed on-time and with high quality. Investigate and analyze the project requirements. Create/Modify test-related artifacts (test cases, test report, test plans) Participate in peer review and inspect requirement documents (test case, user guide, admin guide) Prepare test data and environment as needed to complete testing assignments Perform testing (functional, regression, sanity, security, performance,…) Analyze problems and complete detailed reports Track the defect into bug tracking tools Support development team to reproduce the bugs Be able to learn/self-investigate new knowledge To be able to mentor junior staffs. Weekly and/or on-demand report to supervisor. Strictly follow the project and organization processes, policies and regulations.  Requirements  Bachelor degree in computer science or equivalent. At least 01-year experience in working with enterprise products. Able to work independently, and cooperate well with internal and external teams to get the jobs done with high quality. Familiar with using one of project management tools such as Jira, Redmine, MS Team, etc. Good analytical thinking and how to determine the root cause of the issue/problem. Proactive, carefulness, detailed, well self-organized and responsible in work. Good at time management skill, communication skill, problem solving skill, and presentation skill.  About VSL VSL is a global software solution and software consulting company which provides a wide range of services including full cycle software development, agile testing, and software consulting. Our expertise includes, but is not limited to, emerging technologies such as e-commerce, blockchain, cryptocurrency, fintech, and bots, etc. Job Features  Job Category  Business Analyst, Engineering, Mobile, QC

150.job_description: As part of the web development team, you will be responsible for our web and app projects’ for web application testing, content management, and coding. You will work on multiple projects with many people within our global team. Such a position requires high attention to detail and good communication skills. You will work with an international team that will manage information in Chinese, English, and many other languages. Web technology literacy such as HTML / CSS and common knowledge of basic CMS such as Drupal / WordPress / Joomla, etc. Responsibilities: – Participate in web design, coding, construction and testing of new or improved applications. – Compile and define requests, translate them into functional design documents and participate in the processes of technical design, test planning and user documentation. – End-to-end test management included but was not limited to test estimation, test preparation, test planning, test creation and execution tasks, defect management and taking testing ownership of application under test. – Manage and drive a project from the requirement, test setup, write a test case, test execution, test reporting with Web-Dev teams. – Prepare test cases and provide appropriate planning and execution in feature testing, regression testing, integration testing, performance testing, and another non-functional testing to ensure successful application deployment. – Taking care of requirement document preparation and workflow design to meet business objectives with pleasant customer experience. – Propose enhancements/fixes by analysing performance data/ error cases Requirements: – Bachelor’s degree or higher, in Computer Science or equivalence – 2 years of experience in testing role for web applications – Experience in functional and regression tests – Knowledge of basic skills in HTML / CSS – Knowledge of PHP and popular CMS systems – Knowledge of JavaScript – Experience of work with Linux console – Basic Linux system administration skills – Knowledge of SQL databases – Prior experience in a development role is preferred – Good command of spoken and written English Advantageous: – A passion for problem solving and innovation – Ability to work under pressure and ready to manage ad-hoc projects – Available to fix critical problems and standby to support for outside of regular office hours – Knowledge in other languages such as Spanish, Vietnamese or Chinese is a plus Contact You can send your resume to hriptp.vn e-mail. All candidates will be considered and the appropriate feedback will be provided. Successful applicants will be contacted shortly thereafter to arrange an interview. Please share samples of your work (portfolio or links to published articles) along with your application.

153.job_description: As an Associate Product Manager at VNGGames, you will lead the Product Management team to drive our product vision, strategy, and execution with a strong focus on achieving outstanding product and business outcomes. You will oversee the entire product development process, ensuring alignment with business goals and leading your team to deliver innovative and impactful products that drive measurable business success. This role involves managing the team responsible for the User Management/User Engagement Platform, requiring strategic leadership, a deep understanding of market dynamics, and a hands-on approach to product development and business impact. Key Responsibilities:  Strategy Development: Develop and articulate a comprehensive product vision and strategy that aligns with the company’s long-term goals and market opportunities. Transform high-level business objectives into actionable product plans and roadmaps. Outcome Focus: Ensure that product development initiatives are centered on delivering significant outcomes that enhance user experience, meet market demands, and achieve business goals. Product Outcomes: Drive initiatives to create products that provide exceptional user experiences, address market needs, and stand out in the marketplace. Business Outcomes: Implement strategies to ensure that products contribute to revenue growth, market expansion, customer satisfaction, and overall business performance. Team Leadership: Manage and mentor the Product Management team, with a specific focus on the User Management/User Engagement Platform team. Foster a collaborative and high-performance culture, providing guidance and support to team members, and helping them grow and excel in their roles. Cross-Functional Collaboration: Lead and collaborate with cross-functional teams including engineering, design, marketing, sales, and customer support to ensure successful product development and delivery. Act as the primary point of contact for all product-related matters. Market and Customer Insights: Conduct in-depth market research, customer interviews, and usability studies to gather insights and validate product ideas. Utilize data-driven approaches to inform decision-making and product iterations. Stakeholder Management: Communicate product plans, progress, and results to stakeholders at all levels, ensuring alignment and buy-in from key decision-makers. Present product strategies and updates to the executive team. Performance Measurement: Define and monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure product success and impact. Utilize analytics and feedback to drive continuous improvement and innovation.Yêu cầuExperience: Minimum 7 years of product management experience, with a proven track record of successfully leading and managing products in a technology-driven environment. Previous experience leading a product management team and driving business outcomes is highly preferred. Education: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field. An MBA or advanced degree is preferred. Skills:Strong strategic thinking and problem-solving skills Exceptional team management abilities Excellent communication and presentation skills Proficiency in product management tools and methodologies Deep understanding of market trends and customer needs Ability to lead and influence cross-functional teams Technical acumen to engage with engineering teams effectively Strong data skills: ability to analyze, interpret, and leverage data to inform product decisions and strategiesPreferred:Experience working with user management systems such as loyalty, promotion, customer support, and user profile modules Attributes: Results-driven, customer-focused, innovative, and able to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment

After a successful launch on Uniswap, the project has successfully listed on multiple exchanges within a month, showcasing commitment to innovation and growth. Location: Remote Compensation: USDT (cryptocurrency) Responsibilities: dApp Development:Design, develop, and maintain user interfaces for our decentralized applications (dApps) to ensure a seamless and user-friendly experience. Implement changes and updates to dApps based on user feedback, industry trends, and technological advancements. Integration and Partnerships:Collaborate with vendors and partners to integrate external solutions seamlessly into our dApps, ensuring interoperability and enhanced functionality. Work closely with the business development team to explore and implement partnerships with other companies, fostering growth and expanding our ecosystem. Cross-Departmental Collaboration:Engage with other departments, including backend development, product management, and design, to contribute to the overall growth and success of the company. Actively participate in cross-functional teams to brainstorm and implement strategies that align with the company's goals. API and DeFi Experience: Utilize your expertise in API integration to connect frontend interfaces with backend systems, ensuring efficient data flow and optimal performance. Stay abreast of developments in the decentralized finance (DeFi) space, incorporating relevant technologies and trends into our applications. Vercel Deployment:Leverage your proficiency with Vercel to deploy and manage frontend applications efficiently, ensuring high performance and reliability. Implement best practices for continuous integration and deployment to enhance the development workflow.  Your skills and experience  Experience in typescript, next.js and subgraph Experience in Solidity or Rust Proven experience in frontend development with a focus on Web3 technologies. Strong proficiency in JavaScript, React, and other modern frontend frameworks. Experience with API integration and a solid understanding of decentralized technologies. Familiarity with decentralized finance (DeFi) concepts and protocols. Previous experience with Vercel for deployment and hosting. Excellent problem-solving skills and a proactive mindset. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.  Why you'll love working here  Competitive salary and benefits package. Opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies in the blockchain and Web3 space. Collaborative and inclusive work environment. Professional development opportunities and career growth. 155.job_description: Attractive benefits We are expanding bussiness and people to meet our clients' demands. You are warmly welcomed to join our team, where you got attractive benefits to support your daily performance. OUR BENEFITS You’ll have a rewarding career We believe success should be rewarded and we believe there is always room to grow. When you join Orient, you begin a career path that can take you to amazing places. You’ll work with cutting-edge technology and use the most advanced methodologies. You’ll become a highly-skilled, highly-experienced professional. And you’ll always find new and challenging opportunities at Orient.You’ll work with great people We believe in the power of teamwork and we believe together all things are possible. You’ll have a chance to build strong relationships and positive references.You’ll have fun We believe happy people do the best work and we believe happy people are free people. Responsibilities:  Operation (70%):Manage general operations, including leading and managing high-performing Software Developers and Quality Engineers. Exposure to application development in Angular, C#, .NET, and Azure preferred. Indicate impressive proficiency in Power BI and a strong foundation in data-driven skills. Premium healthcare insurance, Annual health checks up.  Hybrid working (1-day WFH per week).  Onsite opportunity in Australia. 160.job_description: MAIN PURPOSE OF ROLE  Drive the short-term and long-term growth of the TAs through creating TA strategies, managing the development and implementation of brand plans. Responsible for creating demand for the established brands in the assigned therapeutic areas through creating, implementing and tracking relevant strategies and messages aimed at key influencers, customers and patients in all channels to achieve topline goal of organization. Drive brand adoption through development and implementation of designed / adopted to local context. Develop omni-channel approaches, from strategies to operation/execution to catch-up with ethical market dynamics and drive business growth. Create creative innovation, lead agile changing, turn market insights into action plans. Influence positive business results leveraging category, marketplace, and macroeconomic factors that impact business performance. Drive timely, fact-based business decisions by tracking, analyzing, interpreting and applying key metrics. Manage the allocated budget in an effective way and keep monitoring and tracking on a monthly basis. Work with other functions (Medical, business development, sales, CEx….) to drive the execution of the marketing plans and complete other assigned projects. MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES  Develop TA strategies to drive the growth of the assigned TAs in short-term and long-term.  Provide direction, inputs and guidance to the brand managers, TA managers in development of annual brand plans.  Adopt Global TA/ brand strategies to local context through understanding local insights and market intelligence. Monitor execution and implementation of the brand plans. Drive early engagement and executional alignment among cross-functional stakeholders at all levels (e.g. retail sales, HCP sales, regional/global marketing, market access…). Drives market differentiation through commercial innovation (leveraging existing clinicals, claims data, etc. in new ways). Identifies impact of market forces and addresses knowledge gaps to shape go-to-market strategy. Plans for and responds to competitor actions in a timely manner (e.g. contingency plans, program changes and financial impact). Develops and maintains connections with field-force to monitor implementation of programs / pilot new initiatives. Identifies key HCP influencers and KOLs to develop cross-functionally aligned HCP marketing programs. Works in the field with sales force to identify customer insights relevant for development or improvement of marketing programs. Develops and translates consumer insights to brand implications. Responsible for management of TA budget and monthly gating. Formulates forecast assumptions based on data and aligns cross-functional teams. Work with cross-function team to accomplish other assigned projects. Work with business development team on the NPI and NPD projects. Coach the employees to improve their competencies and support them in implementing their growth plan. Manage team’s development throughout the path to achieve goals. Build the team spirit in line with company culture. Ensure team activities to comply with Company Business Code of Conduct and all local applicable laws within scope of function responsibility. SUPERVISORY RESPONSIBILITIES  Develop, motivate and coach the team and provide guidance (2 team members) Set and monitor targets for individual in the team to ensure high performance management Support employees in implementing of their growth plans. Develop and maintain succession plan and address future staffing issues in a proactive manner. Ensure team activities to comply with Company Business Code of Conduct and all local applicable laws within scope of function responsibility. MINIMUM BACKGROUND/ EXPERIENCE REQUIRED  Minimum Experience of 6-8 In marketing and brand management in healthcare/pharma industry  years Worked with reputed MNC organizations.  New Product launch experience will be an advantage University/post-University Bachelor Degree in Pharmacist preferred CORE Skills Required  Professional Skill  Good knowledge in marketing principles Ability to draw the insight and foresight from data analysis and marketing understanding Proven track record for designing, implementing and tracking impact of creative marketing programs through sales force. Proven success in managing brands / portfolio business through development and deployment of strategies and tactics targeting HCPs (including specialist physicians) and their patients Develop a deep understanding of science behind product, relevant disease state and treatment paradigms, leading to conceptualization & implementation of insight driven innovative ‘new to market’ programs Ability to lead, convince and inspire field-force for implementation of marketing programs Interpersonal and influencing skill to build relationships with, collaborate and effectively manage internal and external stakeholders Behavioral / Leadership Skill  Excellent interpersonal skills Self-starter, aggressive for constant improvements Capable of timely and fast, accurate deliverables Apply Abbott Capabilities Framework Language Skill  English proficient Vietnamese Computer Skill Able to utilize computer programs such as notes, excel and PowerPoint to compile, build, analyses and consolidate data

solutions and investment projects on time, on scope, and on budget Developing and managing a data team controlling and normalizing the flow of data from numerous internal and external sources Acting as a senior point of escalation to troubleshoot, report and resolve issues Serving as the senior technical solutions analyst and ensuring strategic technology decisions are evaluated and assessed in threats. 166.company: Công Ty TNHH Phong Cách Mộc
166.job_description: Mô tả công việc: (Mức lương: 15 - 25 triệu VNĐ)  Phong Cách Mộc – Chuyên Gia Kiến Tạo Bản Săc Riêng Cho Không Gian F&B Sau hơn 9 năm hoạt động, PCM đã tham gia hơn 5.000 dự án và hơn 500.000m2 không gian ở trong và ngoài nước. Những con số biết nói này như là bảo chứng niềm tin của khách hàng dành cho đội ngũ PCM. Và chúng tôi đang tìm kiếm người đồng hành, người mà luôn làm tốt nhất có thể công việc của mình.  Giai đoạn 1: Tiếp nhận dự án  Cùng với PTDA làm việc với chủ đầu tư, ghi nhận yêu cầu và tư vấn thiết kế. Khảo sát, đo đạc hiện trạng công trình để lên phương án thiết kế. Làm nhiệm vụ thiết kế (brief): Phân tích yêu cầu của chủ đầu tư.  Giai đoạn 2: Triển khai thiết kế dự án  Phối hợp với team cùng đưa ra phương án công năng và concept không gian dựa trên nhiệm vụ thiết kế (brief). Trình bày bản vẽ 2D layout, 3D concept, phương án thiết kế cho teamleader duyệt. Lên phối cảnh 3D dựa trên phương án công năng và concept cả team đã thống nhất dựa trên yêu cầu của chủ đầu tư.  Giai đoạn 3 : Hỗ trợ thi công dự án  Phối hợp với bộ phận thu mua lựa chọn mẫu mã, vật liệu, thiết bị ... để hoàn thiện về phương án thi công tối ưu. Phối hợp với bộ phận thi công , bộ phận kỹ thuật ,bộ phận giám sát. Thực hiện giám sát tác giả về thẩm mỹ trong quá trình triển khai thi công cho tới khi công trình hoàn thành.Chức vụ: Nhân viên/Chuyên viên  Hình thức làm việc: Toàn thời gian  Quyền lợi được hưởng:  Mức lương hấp dẫn dựa trên kinh nghiệm và năng lực. Chế độ phúc lợi toàn diện bao gồm bảo hiểm y tế, và chế độ nghỉ phép có lương. Cơ hội phát triển nghề nghiệp và đào tạo liên tục. Môi trường làm việc năng động và hỗ trợ với các đồng nghiệp tài năng. Văn phòng hiện đại và tiện nghi tại vị trí thuận tiện.Yêu cầu bằng cấp (tối thiểu): Trung cấp - Nghề  Yêu cầu công việc:  Kinh nghiệm làm việc: 2-4năm kinh nghiệm làm việc ở vị trí tương đương, có kinh nghiệm làm việc về thiết kế FnB Chuyên môn : Thành thạo các phần mềm Sketch Up , Enscape , Autocad , Lightroom , PS Chăm chỉ, cẩn thận, có trách nhiệm với công việc Biết ứng dụng AI vào công việc  Vui lòng đính kèm Portfolio  Yêu cầu giới tính: Nam/Nữ  Ngành nghề: Kiến Trúc,Kiến Trúc/Nội Thất,Thiết Kế,Thiết Kế 3DTrung cấp - Nghề  Không yêu cầu

167.job_description: Thu nhập: 10.000.000-12.000.000  Công việc:  Thiết kế logo và bộ nhận diện thương hiệu. Thiết kế các ấn phẩm truyền thông: Facebook post, Cover, Ads Banner, Video Ads, Landing page,… Thiết kế Key visual cho các chiến dịch Digital Marketing. Phối hợp cùng Content và Media team để triển khai các ấn phẩm chiến dịch, thực hiện dự án. Thiết kế hình ảnh chính cho các dự án Tiếp thị kỹ thuật số.  Yêu cầu:  Có ít nhất 3 năm kinh nghiệm thiết kế. Tốt nghiệp Đại học – trung tâm đào tạo : các ngành thiết kế, mỹ thuật, kiến trúc. Kiến thức về Bất động sản là một lợi thế Đam mê lĩnh vực thiết kế digital marketing Tư duy thiết kế phù hợp với tư duy Marketing, Bất động sản Có kinh nghiệm thiết kế các phần mềm: AI, PTS, Pr, Animation (HTML5 banner), Ae, kiến thức về in ấn , kiến thức về Thương hiệu. Định hướng chi tiết, chủ động, độc lập và chịu được áp lực công việc Thiết kế nhanh, làm việc độc lập, chịu được áp lực công việc cao, có tinh thần teamwork tốt Có khả năng đảm nhận nhiều hạng mục dự án đồng thời và hoàn thành đúng hạn.  Ích lợi:  Môi trường làm việc trẻ trung, năng động, tôn trọng sự khác biệt và đề cao sự phát triển của từng cá nhân. Văn phòng thoải mái, tự do, trà cà phê và thức ăn luôn sẵn sàng phục vụ. Được đào tạo định kỳ và cập nhật những xu hướng mới nhất về Marketing (đặc biệt là trong ngành Bất động sản). Chính sách phúc lợi tốt (du lịch định kỳ, tổ chức sinh nhật, event lễ Tết, Giáng Sinh,…) Ký hợp đồng lao động và hưởng các quyền lợi đúng theo luật lao động (đóng BHXH, BHYT, BHTN,…)  Địa điểm làm việc: số 207c Nguyễn Xí, Phường 26, Quận Bình Thạnh, HCMĐể ứng tuyển, các bạn hãy gửi CV + Portfolio về Emai: hr@munkas.com  Tiêu đề: [MUNKAS] – Ứng dụng tuyển – Nhà thiết kế đồ họa – <Họ tên>. Bất kỳ câu hỏi bạn vui lòng liên hệ đến:  Fanpage Munkas: m.me/munkas.agency Hotline tuyển dụng: 0942.339.025

168.job_description: Date: Aug 29, 2024 Location: Ho Chi Minh, VN Company: AkzoNobel  About AkzoNobel Since 1792, we’ve been supplying the innovative paints and coatings that help to color people’s lives and protect what matters most. Our world class portfolio of brands – including Dulux, International, Sikkens and Interpon – is trusted by customers around the globe. We’re active in more than 150 countries and use our expertise to sustain and enhance the fabric of everyday life. Because we believe every surface is an opportunity. It’s what you’d expect from a pioneering and long-established paints company that’s dedicated to providing sustainable solutions and preserving the best of what we have today – while creating an even better tomorrow. Let’s paint the future together.  For more information please visit www.akzonobel.com  © 2024 Akzo Nobel N.V. All rights reserved.  Key Accountabilities Products: Powder coatings. Maintains and promotes a safe work environment, complies with safety policies and procedures. Follow safe work practices for personal and equipment safety, in both the laboratory and in the field. Result are zero of minimum safety incidents and clean, orderly working environment. Conduct formulation or technical work (in the lab) as defined in the project plan. Fulfill documents result and accuracy through appropriate system. Report outcome to manager. Provide the project's experimental results to the team leader/director on time. Familiar with relevant experimental approaches and techniques.Experience Typically 2-5 years of relevant experience with College’s Degree. Technical education in relevant field, e.g chemistry, chemical technology, environmental, maths, statistics, data science etc. English at immediate level. Market & Product Insight. Business & Technical Communication – Support Problem Solving. Experimental Principles & Design – Support Technical Improvement & Innovation – Support Managing. Sensitive to color, able to see/differentiate color and good in color adjustments.  At AkzoNobel we are highly committed to ensuring an inclusive and respectful workplace where all employees can be their best self. We strive to embrace diversity in a context of tolerance. Our talent acquisition process plays an integral part in this journey, as setting the foundations for a diverse environment. For this reason we train and educate on the implications of our Unconscious Bias in order for our TA and hiring managers to be mindful of them and take corrective actions when applicable. In our organization, all qualified applicants receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age or disability. Requisition ID: 42484

171.job_description: Job DescriptionAbout us  Upskills provides expert financial software consulting for investment banks and leading financial institutions in Asia Pacific, Middle East and Europe region. With a strong, Front to Back expertise of the cash and derivatives markets, coupled by an in-depth knowledge of financial markets technologies, we provide smart, business-wise and efficient solutions.  We are seeking a highly motivated System Engineer to join our Upskills ODC Team with strong experience Managing unix environments and infrastructure management. The successful candidate will integrate a fast growing team and get direct exposure to the technical challenges of international financial institutions. You will take part of important software implementation and be responsible for, and not limited to:  Test, configure and install devices: router, firewall, switch, access point, server, PC… Follow up, manage project progress and provide prompt action to ensure it to match the planned schedule and to meet customer demand Provide day-to-day support to ensure the smooth running of the computers, network devices, printers as well as end users' requirements Manage IT infrastructure, system monitoring and reports Interact with our international clients and our business analysts in Singapore and on the world Scheduled maintenance and patching of Infrastructure environments as necessary Take initiatives to build internal tools Create and perform authorized changes to customer environments. Manage incidents and problems appropriately within agreed service levels RequirementsMaster or Bachelor's Degree in Information Technology, Computer Network, Data Communications, or Sciences At least 2 years of experience as DevOps/System Engineer. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills In-depth knowledge of computer hardware, software, and OS (Windows and macOS) Hands-on experience in Windows server administration and basic knowledge in Linux server administration. Have experience with Linux and Oracle Database Have experience about Cloud is a big plus. Understanding of TCP/IP, IP addressing and LAN Technology including switching and routing fundamentals Strong analytical and troubleshooting skills Passion for learning and adapting to new technologies Basic knowledge of Data migration, Data warehouse and database security principles. Keen interest in financial markets. Working knowledge of financial products a plus Fluent English and good communication skills Skill setAWS, Azure, Shell Scripting, Linux, Python, SQL, Murex, Capital Markets, Unix, Linux, Fintech, English Communication I'm interestedJob InformationIndustryIT Services CityHo Chi Minh City State/ProvinceHo Chi Minh CountryVietnam Zip/Postal Code700000 Work Experience0-2 years

Experience in CSS tools and frameworks (such as SASS, LESS, Bootstrap) A growth mindset: you need to be passionate about learning Able to work with a team as well as independently. English intermediate Experience in Unit Test  Nice to haves:  Experienced in CI/CI, infrastructure (AWS/GCP/Docker/ kubernetes). Experienced in Agile / Scrum methodology Experience in SaaS or product development Experience with Service-Oriented Architectures, API development, and microservices can-do attitude Salary: ~3000 USD Gross Working time: Thứ 2 - Thứ 6: 9h00-18h00 Benefits :  Great salary package. Insurance in full gross salary. Gift for Tet/ Autumn Festival Hot bonus when introduce members ( Referral ) Free coffee (cappuccino, cafe latte, latte macchiato, etc) Flexible working Laptops MacBook Pro, monitors, etc Địa điểm làm việc: TPHCM Lương: 30000K - 70000K VND một tháng Loại hình công việc: Thỏa thuận thời gian Yêu cầu: CV Quyền lợi: Bảo Hiểm Tai Nạn, Chăm Sóc Sức Khỏe, Chế độ bảo hiểm, Thưởng doanh thu, Bảo mật lương Hạn nộp: 2024-10-12 Kinh nghiệm: Không yêu cầu kinh nghiệm làm việc Bằng cấp: Đại học Lĩnh vực: IT/CNTT -IT Phần mềm Số lượng cần tuyển: 5 Giới tính: Không yêu cầu

174.job: NHÂN VIÊN THIẾT KẾ ĐỒ HỌA (GRAPHIC DESIGNER, HCM)
174.company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Viễn Thông FPT Telecom
174.job_description: Số lượng cần tuyển: 1 Loại hình công việc: Toàn thời gian  Đơn vị quản lý: Ban MarketingMức lương: 12000000 - 18000000 VND  Hạn nộp hồ sơ: 19-09-2024  CHI TIẾT CÔNG VIỆC  Thiết kế các hình ảnh phục vụ cho Marketing online (website, fanpage, youtube, video ...), các ấn phẩm, vật phẩm phục vụ của hoạt động truyền thông của doanh nghiệp (banner, standee, băng rôn, ....). Thực hiện những TVC, Trailer, Video Clip theo yêu cầu của cấp trên có tính thẩm mỹ phù hợp Maketing Design dành cho những chiến dịch kinh doanh của công ty. Sử dụng phần mềm chỉnh sửa video để tạo ra sản phẩm cuối cùng một cách chuyên nghiệp. Thực hiện việc chỉnh sửa màu sắc, âm thanh, hiệu ứng đặc biệt và đồ họa chuyển động. Làm việc cùng quản lý để phát triển ý tưởng và kịch bản. Thực hiện quản lý file và lưu trữ đúng cách. Có thể chịu đựng áp lực khi làm việc ở cường độ cao, đúng deadline. Có khả năng làm việc độc lập và làm việc nhóm. Các công việc khác theo sự phân công của cấp trên.  YÊU CẦU CÔNG VIỆC  Ưu tiên Ứng viên tốt nghiệp Cao đẳng/Đại học trở lên chuyên ngành Thiết kế đồ hoạ, Graphic Design hoặc các ngành liên quan khác... Có it nhất 2 năm kinh nghiệm ở vị trí Graphic Designer (lĩnh vực Công nghệ thông tin là một lợi thế). Sử dụng tốt các phần mềm thiết kế như: Adobe After Effects và Adobe Premiere Pro Adobe Illustrator (Ai), Adobe Photoshop (Ps), Adobe Indesign (In), Corel trung cấp trở lên... Sáng tạo, có kiến thức tốt về mỹ thuật và khả năng trình bày ý tưởng. Chịu được áp lực về chất lượng và bảo đảm tiến độ công việc, có tinh thần trách nhiệm cao. Nắm bắt nhanh công việc.  QUYỀN LỢI  Gói thu nhập cạnh tranh (thưởng lương tháng 13, thưởng nghỉ mát....). Đầy đủ các chế độ theo luật lao động hiện hành. Chính sách phúc lợi theo quy định của Công ty đa dạng: Chăm sóc sức khỏe định kì hàng năm; Gói bảo hiểm sức khỏe chuyên biệt (FPT Care – Khám chữa bệnh miễn phí tại tất cả các bệnh viện); Các hoạt động tri ân, chăm lo đời sống tinh thần CBNV và Thân nhân ... Môi trường làm việc thân thiện, cởi mở. Cơ sở vật chất và công cụ làm việc hiện đại, tiện nghi. Nhiều cơ hội phát triển và thăng tiến. Văn hóa Doanh nghiệp đặc sắc, sinh động bậc nhất với nhiều các hoạt động hấp dẫn: tân binh, teambuilding, thi trạng, hội làng, hội diễn Sao Chổi, sinh nhật FPT, ngày 08/03, ngày 11/11... Hưởng các gói ưu đãi cước khi sử dụng dịch vụ của FPT Telecom.  Ghi chú: FPT Telecom không thu bất kỳ chi phí nào của Ứng viên, Sinh viên trong quá trình tuyển dụng, thực tập.  Thông tin liên hệ: Ôn Thanh My  Email: myot2@fpt.com  Điện thoại cố định: 8270  Điện thoại di động: 0703057943

175.job_description: ABOUT THE PROGRAMThrough Sourcing Associate Program, we offer you a unique platform to start your career coached by experienced mentors and managers. You will have the opportunity to rotate within 24 months through different teams. You will be offered training sessions, on-the-job training included, from internal experts to develop your own portfolio of skills and to foster the ability to transfer this knowledge and apply it to your daily work. Your senior-level mentor will provide real-time feedback through the entire course and help you define long-term career paths. Upon Program graduation, you are expected to land in a managerial role. Your commitments to the program will help you establish the knowledge, exposures, and connections to be a well-rounded future Sourcing leader, and further guarantee the continuous success of the Sourcing organization. KEY RESPONSIBILITIESTo learn and actively participate to the basic roles and responsibilities associated with the key Sourcing Operation and Functions, tasks and responsibilities: Product Creation (including Costing, Materials, and Product Testing), Tactical and Production Planning, Manufacturing (including Quality and ME). Successfully intern in these roles and participate as active member to the Teams’ success.  Impact on Business – Provide a pool of highly capable individuals ready to step in key positions when necessary. Customer/Suppliers/Third Parties – Shadowing the Senior Director Sourcing Operations (SDSO)/Directors/Senior Managers in most of his/her interactions, while participating to the Team daily duties, interacts with the same group as the SDSO/Directors/Senior Managers. As part of the daily duties, the Sourcing Associate needs to understand the functions and R&R, provide concrete support to the assigned Departments, report to mentor (SDSO) on a regular basis and receive coaching. Leadership/Management Responsibilities – Capable to take functional and project leadership under SDSO guidance; should be considered by others within the Team as “role model” for higher roles within the organization. Innovation and Change – Create attitude for change and bring new ideas to the Teams. POSSIBLE KEY RELATIONSHIPS SDSO/Directors/Senior Managers, Costing Manager, Materials Manager, Manufacturing Excellence (ME), Quality Teams, HQ Teams T1 management and various levels of the assigned departments KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND ABILITIES Technical skills (manufacturing, planning, project management, industrial engineering, materials engineering, biomechanical or sport science preferred) Communication skills (presentation, efficient note taking, computer literate) Analytical skills, reporting and data collection Open mind, passionate about sports REQUISITE EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE We are looking for world citizens with a passion for excellence, an open and inquisitive mind and passion for sports. Talented individuals, willing to learn, are fitting this job, which requires attention to details, curiosity, spirit of observation and discipline. No previous work experience required but preferred. Vocational training (preferred in a multinational organization), MA in Engineering (Mechanical, Chemical, Industrial) or MBA preferred. Multiple language skills: fluent English -written and spoken- required; German, Mandarin Chinese, Vietnamese, Bahasa Indonesia an advantage. Flexibility and willingness to relocate at Company’s request.AT ADIDAS WE HAVE A WINNING CULTURE. BUT TO WIN, PHYSICAL POWER IS NOT ENOUGH. JUST LIKE ATHLETES OUR EMPLOYEES NEED MENTAL STRENGTH IN THEIR GAME. WE FOSTER THE ATHLETE’S MINDSET THROUGH A SET OF BEHAVIORS THAT WE WANT TO ENABLE AND DEVELOP IN OUR PEOPLE AND THAT ARE AT THE CORE OF OUR UNIQUE COMPANY CULTURE: THIS IS HOW WE WIN WHILE PLAYING FAIR.COURAGE: Speak up when you see an opportunity; step up when you see a need.. OWNERSHIP: Pick up the ball. Be proactive, take responsibility and follow-through. INNOVATION: Elevate to win. Be curious, test and learn new and better ways of doing things. TEAMPLAY: Win together. Work collaboratively and cultivate a shared mindset. INTEGRITY: Play by the rules. Hold yourself and others accountable to our company’s standards. RESPECT: Value all players. Display empathy, be inclusive and show dignity to all. ADIDAS CELEBRATES DIVERSITY, SUPPORTS INCLUSIVENESS AND ENCOURAGES INDIVIDUAL EXPRESSION IN OUR WORKPLACE. WE DO NOT TOLERATE THE HARASSMENT OR DISCRIMINATION TOWARD ANY OF OUR APPLICANTS OR EMPLOYEES. WE ARE AN EQUAL OPPORTUNITY EMPLOYER.  JOB TITLE:Sourcing Associate (Vietnam)BRAND: adidas LOCATION: Ho Chi Minh City TEAM: Sourcing STATE:COUNTRY/REGION: VN CONTRACT TYPE: Full time NUMBER: 515350 DATE: Sep 2, 2024

177.job_description: Giới thiệu: Trải qua hơn 20 năm kinh nghiệm quản trị cùng nhiều năm tư vấn và triển khai phần mềm ERP. Hơn ai hết, chúng tôi hiểu rõ nỗi đau của doanh nghiệp Việt Nam trong công cuộc chuyển đổi số. Với phương châm “Chuyển đổi số không phải vấn đề của kỹ thuật, cốt lõi là tư duy quản trị”, đội ngũ NOS luôn chú trọng vào việc khảo sát tình hình thực tế và tư vấn các quy trình quản trị trước khi triển khai Odoo - một trong những phần mềm quản trị được ưa chuộng trên toàn thế giới.
